## GoogleAIFileManager.uploadFile() method

Upload a file from a local file path. Note: This method requires the fs module and will not work in serverless environments. For serverless environments, use uploadFileFromBuffer or uploadFileFromUrl instead.

**Signature:**

```typescript
uploadFile(fileData: string | Buffer, fileMetadata: FileMetadata): Promise<UploadFileResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fileData | string \| Buffer |  |
|  fileMetadata | [FileMetadata](./generative-ai.filemetadata.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[UploadFileResponse](./generative-ai.uploadfileresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;
